alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:23PM EST until January 11 at 7:20AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Middle Oconee River near Arcade affecting Barrow and Jackson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Georgia... West Chickamauga Creek at GA 146 near Lakeview affecting Hamilton and Catoosa Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Middle Oconee River near Arcade. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Significant flooding occurs in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage at Georgia Highway 82. A residential yard will be completely flooded with the water reaching the foundation of a house just downstream. The flood waters will be reaching Bismarck Circle Road upstream from the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 21.5 feet. Due to equipment malfunction, this gage has stopped reporting, and a more current observation is not available. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 AM EST Wednesday was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.0 feet early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EST.
